1289110.name: Drums of War Soundtrack
1289110.description: From the Indie Game hit The Forest, composer Gabe Castro brings you something different: A Bone Crushing Heavy Metal soundtrack that lies at the heart of the VR Music Game: Drums of War. Not only are the shredding axes and thumping double bass drums an amazing work of instrumental metal; this soundtrack will make any fighting game you play come to life when this is pumping over your speakers in the background.
